channel.title: Time Series on Ivona's blog

item.title: Time Series
item.description: Here is the instruction how to make Time Series. Like everywhere, first we have to install the pakages: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) In this example we want to see Babe Ruthâ€™s homeruns over his career in baseball. query<-"SELECT yearID,HR FROM Batting WHERE playerID='ruthba01'" result<-sqldf(query) Now we want to make the paragraf, and for that we need ggplot2: ggplot()+ geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ geom_point(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ ggtitle("Ruth's Homerans Totals Trough the Years")+ xlab("Year")+ ylab("Homeruns")
